title: Signer an older character
content:
An older font of mine called Signer and some pictures during its design process.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [3\_fortgeschritten (oben).pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213943/http:/typophile.com/files/3_fortgeschritten%20(oben).pdf) | 39.87 KB |
| [Allure\_image+s\_gef.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213943/http:/typophile.com/files/Allure_image+s_gef.pdf) | 639.59 KB |
| [e\_besseres Resultat.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213943/http:/typophile.com/files/e_besseres%20Resultat.pdf) | 37.99 KB |
| [agx\_g\_finaleSynthese.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213943/http:/typophile.com/files/agx_g_finaleSynthese.pdf) | 109 KB |
| [gg\_erneut verbessert\_Charakter.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213943/http:/typophile.com/files/gg_erneut%20verbessert_Charakter.pdf) | 113.04 KB |
author: Stefan Seifert

comments.content:
it's great to know about it, definitely put these images into consideration. keep up the awesome work.
